title: Tech Radar Configuration
description: JSON Schema for Tech Radar configuration file that defines technologies, tools, techniques, and platforms plotted on a radar visualization

date.description: The date/version of this tech radar snapshot

entries.description: Array of technology entries to be plotted on the radar

radarEntry.description: A single technology entry on the tech radar

quadrant.description: The quadrant where this entry appears (0: Tools, 1: Platforms, 2: Languages & Frameworks, 3: Techniques)

ring.description: The ring/level of adoption (0: Adopt, 1: Trial, 2: Assess, 3: Hold)

active.description: Whether this entry is currently active/visible on the radar

moved.description: Movement indicator (-1: moved out, 0: no change, 1: moved in)

link.description: Optional URL link to more information about this technology
